1.content: Shippo had left their camp and played with some chemicals and potions when he accidentally mixed two together, making a bubbling brew of shrink potion. He tries it out on a frog, and it shrunk to a fly. At this moment, his stomach growled and a tasty smell reached his nose. He followed it to the source:
1.title: first meal?

choices: Shippo eats him in his sleep
InuYasha wakes up and then eaten
11.content: He gasped as the scent came from the sleeping InuYasha, and then focused when his stomach growled again. He poured a bit of potion in InuYasha's snoring mouth, making him shrink to just shorter than Shippo.
11.title: InuYasha

choices: InuYasha screams and is spit out
111.content: Shippo opens his mouth and lifts up his prey, dropping him feet first into his mouth. He murrs at the taste of InuYasha's feet and legs, gulping him down enough to close his mouth on the last of his food. He sucked on his head, waking him to the shock of reality.
111.title: Shippo eats him in his sleep

info.brief_description: Shippo's new shrinking potion gives him a vorish opportunity
info.description:
Shippo makes a shrinking potion, and he gets hungry...

soft oral vore only
no digestion
no sexual content
shrinking is not required but recommended
